item.title: [video] – It is time for a different kind of university
item.description: Kaplan Universityhas produced two interesting and inspiring videos on how e-Learningcan be performed in near future. It’s time to use technologyto rewritethe rules of education… [youtube e50YBu14j3U] Here is another one. [youtube F3nHvkJSNFg] Besides I have found an interesting article written by George Siemenson How MIT is going to get large lectures off the blackboard. The whole artikle is called Media Literacy: Making Sense of New Technologies and Media by George Siemens.
